snippet.title: Kinect Sports: Season 2 - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Relive your childhood sports fantasies on the virtual fields of Kinect in the new Xbox 360 game Kinect Sports: Season 2. Get fit and have fun with the sequel to the hit.

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more:
http://www.ign.com

Want this week's top videos? Sign up:
http://go.ign.com/VideoRound-up
